title: Let me buy RP
body: Hey rito I'm a trash riven main and I believe that championship riven will carry me to challenger. Please let me purchase 10 RP and make my dreams come true

replies.body: Your poetic words really call out to me, and we'd love to help if we can!  Just reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll assist individually.  We'll respond asap!
Hello Rito employee of the month! No one has replied to my Support Ticket:((( What should I do?
Thank you very much for giving direction to my life, I shall go there and see what can be done.
